                                             float angle)

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • transfrom

        public Vec3 transfrom​(Vec3 vec)
        Compute three-dimensional transformation. vec is converted to quaternion and then this x vec x this* computed.
        Parameters:
        vec - The vector which has to be transformed
        Returns:
        The transformed vector

      • transfrom

        public Vec4 transfrom​(Vec4 vec)
        Compute three-dimensional transformation. vec is converted to quaternion and then this x vec x this* computed. Only makes sense, if vec.w = 0
        Parameters:
        vec - The vector which has to be transformed
        Returns:
        The transformed vector
